SELECT IDX,U_ID, V_ID, V_NM, P_NO, LEFT(WDT,10) AS WDT, LEFT(VDT, 10) AS VDT, CONT, PHOTO, CASE WHEN LENGTH(CONT) > 300 THEN CONCAT( LEFT(CONT, 50), "...") ELSE "0" -- 있는지 없는지 판단을 위해 사용 END AS C_SKIP FROM VISIT WHERE U_ID=#{uId}
AND (CONT LIKE CONCAT( "%", #{word}, "%") OR V_NM LIKE CONCAT( "%", #{word}, "%") )
AND CONT LIKE CONCAT( "%", #{word}, "%")
AND V_NM LIKE CONCAT( "%", #{word}, "%")
AND DATE_FORMAT(WDT,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{sdt},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(WDT,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{edt},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(WDT,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -1 month),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(now() ,'%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY VDT DESC, IDX DESC
